attributes.action: grant a peerage to John Wick for his bravery and courage in bringing to light the disgraceful behaviour of  our members of parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: More information about how Lords are appointed can be found here: http://www.parliament.uk/about/how/members/lords_appointment.cfm
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
